name: part_010
file: tmp_ASACOCO LIVE NEWS on a Birthday？  #asacoco [SwodJntnYBg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Introduction showing a traditional office-style room.
Watame and Coco discussing the difficulties of choosing clothes during changing seasons.
Coco reveals the new 'Kiryu-kai' crest jersey hoodie as a solution to Watame's problem.
Kiryu Coco's first 3D live performance MC section.
Kiryu Coco performs her original song 'Weather Hackers'.

subtitles.original: あー、暑い。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's hot.

subtitles.original: でも寒い。
subtitles.english: But it's also cold.

subtitles.original: お、なんだか辛そうですね。
subtitles.english: Oh? You look like you're having a hard time.

subtitles.original: どうしたんですか？
subtitles.english: What happened?

subtitles.original: ココち、最近一気に暑くなってきて、汗が出てきちゃって。
subtitles.english: Coco-chi, it's suddenly gotten hot lately and I'm sweating.

subtitles.original: でも、クーラーをつけたら一気に部屋が寒くなるし。
subtitles.english: But if I turn on the AC, the room gets cold all at once.

subtitles.original: 今はちょうど温度の調節が難しい季節な気がしますね。
subtitles.english: I feel like it's a season where it's hard to adjust the temperature right now.

subtitles.original: そうなんだよ。
subtitles.english: That's right.

subtitles.original: 今は体調管理も大切だから、安易に身体を冷やしてはいけないしね。
subtitles.english: Health management is important now, so I can't just cool my body down carelessly.

subtitles.original: 困ったな。
subtitles.english: It's a problem.

subtitles.original: この服は暑すぎるし、
subtitles.english: This outfit is too hot,

subtitles.original: この服じゃ寒いかな。
subtitles.english: but this one might be too cold.

subtitles.original: なるほど。今の季節にぴったりの服を選ぶのは大変そうですよね。
subtitles.english: I see. It seems hard to choose clothes that are perfect for this season.

subtitles.original: あー、
subtitles.english: Ah,

subtitles.original: こんな時に暑さも寒さも気楽に調節できる服があればな。
subtitles.english: if only there was an outfit that could easily adjust for both heat and cold at a time like this.

subtitles.original: その言葉を待っていたんです！
subtitles.english: I've been waiting for those words!

subtitles.original: え、まさか...
subtitles.english: Eh, no way...

subtitles.original: その「まさか」です。
subtitles.english: Yes, "no way".

subtitles.original: あのあさココブランドがついにアパレル業界に参入。
subtitles.english: The Asacoco brand has finally entered the apparel industry.

subtitles.original: この季節にぴったりの「あれ」が、ついに発売開始。
subtitles.english: That thing that's perfect for this season is finally on sale.

subtitles.original: あのCコさんも愛用中。
subtitles.english: Even that C-ko-san uses it.

subtitles.original: その名も...
subtitles.english: Its name is...

subtitles.original: 「桐生会」代紋ジャージパーカー！！
subtitles.english: "Kiryu-kai" Crest Jersey Hoodie!!

subtitles.original: やったー、待ってました！
subtitles.english: Yay! I've been waiting for this!

subtitles.original: このジャージなら着脱簡単。
subtitles.english: With this jersey, putting it on and taking it off is easy.

subtitles.original: 寒いときはしっかり肩まで着用、
subtitles.english: Wear it up to your shoulders when it's cold,

subtitles.original: 暑いときはゆるーく腕まで。
subtitles.english: and loosely to your arms when it's hot.

subtitles.original: それだけじゃないんです。
subtitles.english: That's not all.

subtitles.original: 激しいバイオレンスな気持ちが抑えられないときは、
subtitles.english: When you can't suppress intense, violent feelings,

subtitles.original: 袖を引きちぎって世紀末スタイルにも。
subtitles.english: tear off the sleeves for a post-apocalyptic style.

subtitles.original: おー！暑さにも寒さにも世紀末にも対応しているこのジャージ。
subtitles.english: Oh! This jersey works for heat, cold, and the post-apocalypse.

subtitles.original: 使い勝手は圧倒的ですけど、
subtitles.english: Its usability is overwhelming, but...

subtitles.original: もしかして、結構高い？
subtitles.english: is it expensive?

subtitles.original: 袖引きちぎっちゃったけど。
subtitles.english: I tore the sleeves off, though.

subtitles.original: そんなことはないんです。
subtitles.english: That's not the case.

subtitles.original: なんとこちらのジャージ、桐生ココ誕生日記念ということで。
subtitles.english: Actually, since this jersey is to commemorate Kiryu Coco's birthday...

subtitles.original: 10,000円にて販売開始！
subtitles.english: It's on sale for 10,000 yen!

subtitles.original: い、1万円？
紙切れ1枚で買えるなんてお得すぎる。
subtitles.english: I can buy it for just one 10,000 yen bill? That's too good a deal.

subtitles.original: 今すぐ注文しなきゃ。
subtitles.english: I have to order it right now!

subtitles.original: 超お得な代紋ジャージ。
subtitles.english: The super-deal "Daimon" Jersey.

subtitles.original: ホロライブの代紋も入っていて、超可愛い。
subtitles.english: It's got the Hololive "Daimon" on it and it's super cute.

subtitles.original: 販売期間は短くなっておりますので、
subtitles.english: The sales period is short, so

subtitles.original: 皆様忘れずにご購入を。
subtitles.english: everyone, don't forget to purchase yours.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、見えますか？
subtitles.english: Everyone, can you see me?

subtitles.original: ここがどこか分かりますか？
subtitles.english: Do you know where this is?

subtitles.original: このアイドル衣装でステージに立つのは、
subtitles.english: Standing on stage in this idol costume is

subtitles.original: 実は今回がね、初めてなんです！
subtitles.english: actually... the first time for me!

subtitles.original: アイドル桐生ココお見せできるなんて思ってなかったぜ！
subtitles.english: I never thought I'd be able to show you Idol Kiryu Coco!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: すごい、あのね、お客さんの前でちょっと緊張しますけど、
subtitles.english: Amazing, you know, I'm a bit nervous in front of the audience, but

subtitles.original: 私もアイドルだったってところを見せたいと思いますね。
subtitles.english: I want to show you that I'm an idol too!

subtitles.original: それでは聞いてください。
subtitles.english: Then, please listen.

subtitles.original: 桐生ココオリジナルソング、
subtitles.english: Kiryu Coco's original song...

subtitles.original: My own original song、
subtitles.english: My own original song,

subtitles.original: Weather Hackers！
subtitles.english: Weather Hackers!

subtitles.original: 負けそうなときは　勇気をあげるよ
subtitles.english: When you feel like losing, I'll give you courage

subtitles.original: 今日も　ハメるあさココで☆
subtitles.english: Today too, getting high with Asacoco☆

subtitles.original: Weather Hackers☆ 作詞作曲：CielP
subtitles.english: Weather Hackers☆ Lyrics/Composition: CielP

subtitles.original: お前　どこの組のもんや？
subtitles.english: You, which gang are you from?

subtitles.original: いい眼をしとるやないけ
subtitles.english: You've got good eyes

subtitles.original: そんなにボロボロになって
subtitles.english: You're so worn out,

subtitles.original: どうしたんや？とりあえずまぁ上がれや
subtitles.english: what happened? For now, get up

subtitles.original: チャカも　ロケランも　格闘もいらないよ
subtitles.english: I don't need guns, rocket launchers, or combat

subtitles.original: 前に進む　勇気があれば
subtitles.english: If you have the courage to move forward

subtitles.original: 君が今踏み出した　力強い一歩で
subtitles.english: The powerful step you've taken today

subtitles.original: どんな天気も　晴れてゆくよ
subtitles.english: Any weather will clear up
